member.name: T:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.AmazonMarketplaceEntitlementServiceRequest
member.summary: Base class for MarketplaceEntitlementService operation requests.

member.name: T:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.Entitlement
member.summary: An entitlement represents capacity in a product owned by the customer. For example, a customer might own some number of users or seats in an SaaS application or some amount of data capacity in a multi-tenant database.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.Entitlement.CustomerIdentifier
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property CustomerIdentifier.
The customer identifier is a handle to each unique customer in an application. Customer identifiers are obtained through the ResolveCustomer operation in AWS Marketplace Metering Service.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.Entitlement.Dimension
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Dimension.
The dimension for which the given entitlement applies. Dimensions represent categories of capacity in a product and are specified when the product is listed in AWS Marketplace.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.Entitlement.ExpirationDate
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ExpirationDate.
The expiration date represents the minimum date through which this entitlement is expected to remain valid. For contractual products listed on AWS Marketplace, the expiration date is the date at which the customer will renew or cancel their contract. Customers who are opting to renew their contract will still have entitlements with an expiration date.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.Entitlement.ProductCode
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ProductCode.
The product code for which the given entitlement applies. Product codes are provided by AWS Marketplace when the product listing is created.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.Entitlement.Value
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Value.
The EntitlementValue represents the amount of capacity that the customer is entitled to for the product.

member.name: T:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.EntitlementValue
member.summary: The EntitlementValue represents the amount of capacity that the customer is entitled to for the product.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.EntitlementValue.BooleanValue
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property BooleanValue.
The BooleanValue field will be populated with a boolean value when the entitlement is a boolean type. Otherwise, the field will not be set.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.EntitlementValue.DoubleValue
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property DoubleValue.
The DoubleValue field will be populated with a double value when the entitlement is a double type. Otherwise, the field will not be set.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.EntitlementValue.IntegerValue
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property IntegerValue.
The IntegerValue field will be populated with an integer value when the entitlement is an integer type. Otherwise, the field will not be set.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.EntitlementValue.StringValue
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property StringValue.
The StringValue field will be populated with a string value when the entitlement is a string type. Otherwise, the field will not be set.

member.name: T:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the GetEntitlements operation. GetEntitlements retrieves entitlement values for a given product. The results can be filtered based on customer identifier or product dimensions.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsRequest.Filter
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Filter.
Filter is used to return entitlements for a specific customer or for a specific dimension. Filters are described as keys mapped to a lists of values. Filtered requests are unioned for each value in the value list, and then intersected for each filter key.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsRequest.MaxResults
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MaxResults.
The maximum number of items to retrieve from the GetEntitlements operation. For pagination, use the NextToken field in subsequent calls to GetEntitlements.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsRequest.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
For paginated calls to GetEntitlements, pass the NextToken from the previous GetEntitlementsResult.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsRequest.ProductCode
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ProductCode.
Product code is used to uniquely identify a product in AWS Marketplace. The product code will be provided by AWS Marketplace when the product listing is created.

member.name: T:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsResponse
member.summary: The GetEntitlementsRequest contains results from the GetEntitlements operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsResponse.Entitlements
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Entitlements.
The set of entitlements found through the GetEntitlements operation. If the result contains an empty set of entitlements, NextToken might still be present and should be used.

member.name: P:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsResponse.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
For paginated results, use NextToken in subsequent calls to GetEntitlements. If the result contains an empty set of entitlements, NextToken might still be present and should be used.

member.name: T:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.AmazonMarketplaceEntitlementServiceClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing MarketplaceEntitlementService
AWS Marketplace Entitlement Service
This reference provides descriptions of the AWS Marketplace Entitlement Service API.
AWS Marketplace Entitlement Service is used to determine the entitlement of a customer to a given product. An entitlement represents capacity in a product owned by the customer. For example, a customer might own some number of users or seats in an SaaS application or some amount of data capacity in a multi-tenant database.
Getting Entitlement Records
GetEntitlements- Gets the entitlements for a Marketplace product.

member.name: M:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.AmazonMarketplaceEntitlementServiceClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonMarketplaceEntitlementServiceClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.AmazonMarketplaceEntitlementServiceClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonMarketplaceEntitlementServiceClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.summary:

member.name: M:Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.IAmazonMarketplaceEntitlementService.GetEntitlementsAsync(Amazon.MarketplaceEntitlementService.Model.GetEntitlementsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GetEntitlements retrieves entitlement values for a given product. The results can be filtered based on customer identifier or product dimensions.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetEntitlements service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the GetEntitlements service method, as returned by MarketplaceEntitlementService.
member.exception: An internal error has occurred. Retry your request. If the problem persists, post a message with details on the AWS forums.
One or more parameters in your request was invalid.
The calls to the GetEntitlements API are throttled.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for GetEntitlements Operation
